title: Low fat chicken and mushroom pie
ingredients: ['Pastry', '1 medium carnival squash', '1 egg', '270g plain flour, plus extra for rolling', '1 egg for glaze if desired', 'Filling', '250g mushrooms, chopped', '4 skinless boneless chicken breast fillets, diced', '1 (295g) tin reduced fat condensed cream of mushroom soup', '275ml water']
